anya-e0803n1:1_3: vīsatiyā upasaggesu yena kenaci upasaggena atthavisesakāraṇena paṭibaddhā atthavisesampi dhāretīti dhātu,
anya-e0803n1:1_5: ayamito paccayo paro’’tiādinā anekappakārena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati esātipi dhātu,
anya-e0803n1:1_6: vidahanti viduno etāya saddanipphattiṁ ayalohādimayaṁ ayalohādidhātūhi viyātipi dhātu.
anya-e0803n1:4_0: Atha vā jinamate ‘‘tato gotamidhātūnī’’ti ettha dhātusaddo liṅgavipallāse vattati ‘‘pabbatāni vanāni cā’’ti ettha pabbatasaddo viya,
anya-e0803n1:4_1: na panettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘aṭṭhivācakattā napuṁsakaniddeso’’ti aṭṭhivācakattepi ‘‘dhātuyo’’ti itthiliṅgadassanato.
anya-e0803n1:4_4: Bhū i ku ke takka taka taki sukaiccādayo.
anya-e0803n1:4_5: Gaṇato te aṭṭhavidhā bhūvādigaṇo rudhādigaṇo divādigaṇo svādigaṇo kiyādigaṇo gahādigaṇo tanādigaṇo curādigaṇo cāti.
anya-e0803n1:4_7: Anekavidhā hi paccayā nānappakāresu nāmanāma kitanāma samāsanāma taddhitanāmākhyātesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n1:4_8: Saṅkhepato pana duvidhāva nāmapaccayo ākhyātapaccayo cāti.
anya-e0803n1:4_10: Tattha vikaraṇapaccayo akārādisattarasavidho aggahitaggahaṇena pannarasavidho ca.
anya-e0803n1:4_12: Ye rūpanipphattiyā upakārakā atthavisesassa jotakā vā ajotakā vā lopanīyā vā alopanīyā vā,
anya-e0803n1:5_0: Paṭicca kāraṇaṁ taṁ taṁ, entīti paccayātha vā;
anya-e0803n1:8_0: Nāmakappe yato tasmā, na taṁ vitthārayāmase.
anya-e0803n1:11_0: Iccānekavidhesu paccayesu ‘‘vikaraṇapaccayā nāma ime’’ti sallakkhetabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n1:11_5: svādigaṇato ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayā honti kattari,
anya-e0803n1:12_0: Akāro ca ivaṇṇo ca, e okārā ca yo tathā;
anya-e0803n1:13_0: Ṇu ṇā uṇā ca nā ppa ṇhā-yirā ṇe ṇayapaccayā.
anya-e0803n1:16_0: Ye evaṁ niddiṭṭhehi vikaraṇapaccayehi tadaññehi ca sappaccayā aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā suttantesu bahūpakārā,
anya-e0803n1:16_5: na pana ‘‘dhammabhūto’’tiādīsu pattiatthavācikā aparā bhūdhātu viya sakammikā.
anya-e0803n1:16_6: Esā hi pariabhiādīhi upasaggehi yuttāyeva sakammikā bhavati,
anya-e0803n1:16_7: na upa parā pātuādīhi upasagganipātehi yuttāpi.
anya-e0803n1:16_8: Ato imissā siddhāni rūpāni dvidhā ñeyyāni akammakapadāni sakammakapadāni cāti.
anya-e0803n1:18_0: Tatra bhavati ubbhavati samubbhavati pabhavati parābhavati sambhavati vibhavati,
anya-e0803n1:18_1: bhoti sambhoti vibhoti pātubhavati pātubbhavati pātubhoti,
anya-e0803n1:18_4: so ‘‘āvibhavati tirobhavatī’’tiādīsu āvi tironipātā viya bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa neva visesakaro,
anya-e0803n1:18_21: te bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa visesakarā ceva sakammakattasādhakā ca.
anya-e0803n1:19_0: Tatra bhavatīti hoti vijjati paññāyati sarūpaṁ labhati.
anya-e0803n1:19_4: Atha vā pabhavatīti yato kutoci sandati,
anya-e0803n1:19_8: Parābhavatīti parābhavo hoti byasanaṁ āpajjati avuddhiṁ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0803n1:19_9: Sambhavatīti suṭṭhu bhavati vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0803n1:19_12: Bhoti sambhoti vibhotīti imāni ‘‘bhavati sambhavati vibhavatī’’ti imehi yathākkamaṁ samānaniddesāni.
anya-e0803n1:19_13: Pātubhavatīti pakāsati dissati paññāyati pākaṭaṁ hoti.
anya-e0803n1:19_15: Evaṁ akammakapadānaṁ yathārahaṁ sakammakākammakavasena atthakathanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:20_0: Paribhotidukādīsu pana sattasu dukesu yathākkamaṁ dve dve padāni samānatthāni,
anya-e0803n1:20_1: tasmā dve dve padāniyeva gahetvā niddisissāma.
anya-e0803n1:20_2: Tatra paribhoti paribhavatīti paraṁ hiṁsati pīḷeti,
anya-e0803n1:20_5: Adhibhoti adhibhavatīti paraṁ abhimadditvā bhavati attano vasaṁ vattāpeti.
anya-e0803n1:20_7: Anubhoti anubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṁ vedeti paribhuñjati sukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī hoti.
anya-e0803n1:20_8: Samanubhoti samanubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṁ suṭṭhu vedeti suṭṭhu paribhuñjati suṭṭhu sukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī hoti.
anya-e0803n1:20_11: Katthaci pana gacchatīti pavattatīti evaṁ akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n1:26_0: Tatra bhāvetīti puggalo bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci bhāveti āsevati bahulīkaroti,
anya-e0803n1:26_2: Vibhāvetīti bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci vibhāveti visesena bhāveti,
anya-e0803n1:26_3: vividhena vā ākārena bhāveti bhāvayati vaḍḍheti,
anya-e0803n1:26_5: Sambhāvetīti yassa kassaci guṇaṁ sambhāveti sambhāvayati suṭṭhu pakāseti ukkaṁseti.
anya-e0803n1:26_6: Paribhāvetīti paribhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci paribhāveti paribhāvayati samantato vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0803n1:26_8: Atha vā paribhāvetīti vāsetabbaṁ vatthuṁ paribhāveti paribhāvayati vāseti gandhaṁ gāhāpeti.
anya-e0803n1:26_10: Paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṁ paribhāvāpeti hiṁsāpeti,
anya-e0803n1:26_12: Abhibhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṁ abhibhāvāpeti ajjhottharāpeti.
anya-e0803n1:26_13: Anubhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sampattiṁ anubhāvāpeti paribhojeti.
anya-e0803n1:28_0: Kriyaṁ sādheti etassa, dīpakaṁ sāsane padaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:34_3: tathā paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalassa sapattaṁ paribhāvāpetīti.
anya-e0803n1:37_0: Bhaviyate vibhaviyate paribhaviyate abhibhaviyate anubhaviyate paribhūyate abhibhūyate anubhūyate,
anya-e0803n1:37_2: Aññathā ca bhaviyyate vibhaviyyate paribhaviyyate abhibhaviyyate anubhaviyyate paribhuyyate abhibhuyyate anubhuyyateti.
anya-e0803n1:37_3: Ettha kammuno kriyāpadāniyeva kammakattuno kriyāpadāni katvā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:38_0: Tatra bhaviyateti bhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci puggalena bhāviyate āseviyate bahulīkariyate,
anya-e0803n1:38_2: Vibhaviyateti vibhāvetabbaṁ yaṁ kiñci puggalena vibhaviyate visesena bhaviyate,
anya-e0803n1:38_7: Abhibhaviyateti sapatto puggalena abhibhaviyate ajjhotthariyate abhimaddiyate.
anya-e0803n1:38_10: Sesāni pana yathāvuttehi yaṁ kammameva padhānato gahetvā niddisiyati padaṁ,
anya-e0803n1:38_12: Tasmā kattari ekavacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṁ bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n1:38_16: Tathā kattari bahuvacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṁ ekavacanavasena vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n1:38_24: Iminā nayena sabbattha kammuno kriyāpadesu vohāro kātabbo.
anya-e0803n1:38_25: Yasmiṁ pana kammuno kriyāpade kammatthadīpake kammabhūtassevatthassa kattubhāvaparikappo hoti,
anya-e0803n1:38_27: taṁ kammuno kriyāpadato visuṁ na labbhati.
anya-e0803n1:38_29: Sayameva paribhaviyate dubbhāsitaṁ bhaṇaṁ bālo tappaccayā aññehi paribhūtopi,
anya-e0803n1:38_30: sayameva abhibhaviyate pāpakārī niraye nirayapālehi abhibhūtopi tathārūpassa kammassa sayaṁ katattāti.
anya-e0803n1:38_32: sayameva kaṭo kariyatetiādīsu viya sukhābhisaṅkharaṇīyatā labbhateva,
anya-e0803n1:41_3: Tatra yathā ṭhīyatepadassa ṭhānanti bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n1:41_5: Yathā ca ṭhānaṁ ṭhiti bhavanantiādīhi bhāvavācakakitantanāmapadehi saddhiṁ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n1:41_6: na tathā ṭhīyate bhūyatetiādīhi bhāvavācakākhyātapadehi saddhiṁ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanā icchitabbā sambandhe
anya-e0803n1:41_8: Yasmiṁ payoge yaṁ kammuno kriyāpadena samānagatikaṁ katvā vinā kammena niddisiyati kriyāpadaṁ,
anya-e0803n1:41_9: kattuvācakapadaṁ pana paccattavacanena vā karaṇavacanena vā niddisiyati,
anya-e0803n1:41_11: Na hi sabbathā kattāramanissāya bhāvo pavattati.
anya-e0803n1:41_12: Evaṁ santepi bhāvo nāma kevalo bhavanalavanapacanādiko dhātuatthoyeva.
anya-e0803n1:41_13: Akkharacintakā pana ‘‘ṭhīyate bhūyate’’tiādīsu bhāvavisayesu karaṇavacanameva payuñjanti ‘‘nanu nāma
anya-e0803n1:41_14: pabbajitena sunivatthena bhavitabbaṁ supārutena ākappasampannenā’’tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0803n1:41_15: tasmā tesaṁ mate ‘‘tena ubbhaviyate’’ti karaṇavacanena yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:59_0: Siyā sakammakaṁ, netaṁ, tathā hotīti dīpaye.
anya-e0803n1:61_0: Vinā yapaccayaṁ tiṭṭhe, na tathā tiṭṭhate idaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:62_0: Na kattari bhuvādīnaṁ, gaṇe yapaccayo ruto;
anya-e0803n1:64_0: Na bhūdhātu divādīnaṁ, dhātūnaṁ dissate gaṇe;
anya-e0803n1:72_0: Sarūpato pakāseti, tasmā te pākaṭā ubho;
anya-e0803n1:78_0: Yasmā ca kattubhāvena, bhāvo nāma na tiṭṭhati;
anya-e0803n1:80_0: Yajjevaṁ kattuvohāro, bhāvassa tu kathaṁ siyā;
anya-e0803n1:82_0: Iti ce nissayānaṁ tu, vasā nissitasambhavā;
anya-e0803n1:90_0: Pāḷiṁ patvāna tesaṁ tu, vacanaṁ appamāṇakaṁ;
anya-e0803n1:92_0: Pāṭho pāvacane diṭṭho, tasmā evaṁ vademase;
anya-e0803n1:94_0: Vacanehi yutaṁ dvīhi, icchitabbanti no ruci;
anya-e0803n1:98_2: kammakattukriyāpadehi vā pañcadhā bhūdhātuto nipphannāni kriyāpadāni nānappakārena niddiṭṭhāni,
anya-e0803n1:98_3: etāni lokiyānaṁ bhāvabhedavasena vohārabhedo hotīti dassanatthaṁ visuṁ visuṁ vuttāni.
anya-e0803n1:98_5: Hetukattā hi suddhakattusaṅkhāte kārake tassaṅgabhāvato saṅgahamupagacchati,
anya-e0803n1:98_8: So hi gamanapacanalavanādivasenānekavidhopi kriyāsabhāvattā bhedarahito kārakantaro.
anya-e0803n1:98_10: Tena pāvacane bhāvavācakaṁ padaṁ bahuvacanantampi dissati.
anya-e0803n1:98_16: Iti mukhyato vā hetuto vā bhāvassa kārakatā na labbhati.
anya-e0803n1:98_21: tasmā nāmikapade kārakalakkhaṇe bhāvakārakanti vohāraṁ pahāya kattukammakaraṇasampadānāpādānādhikaraṇānaṁ
anya-e0803n1:98_22: channaṁ vatthūnaṁ kattukārakakammakārakantiādi vohāro kariyati veyyākaraṇehi.
anya-e0803n1:98_23: Evaṁ niruttinayaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ bhāvakārakañca dve ca kammakattukārakānīti kārakattayaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n1:103_0: Idha bhāvakammesu attanopaduppattiṁ keci akkharacintakā avassamicchantīti tesaṁ mativibhāvanatthamamhehi
anya-e0803n1:103_1: bhāvakammānaṁ kriyāpadāni attanopadavasenuddiṭṭhāni ceva niddiṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n1:103_2: Sabbānipi panetāni tikārakāni kriyāpadāni kriyāpadamālamicchatā parassapadattanopadavasena yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:103_3: Pāḷiādīsu hi tikārakāni kriyāpadāni parassapadattanopadavasena dvidhā ṭhitāni.
anya-e0803n1:103_11: Kathaṁ paṭipannassa puggalassa rūpaṁ vibhoti vibhaviyyati.
anya-e0803n1:103_19: So pahīyethāpi no pahīyethāti evaṁ dvidhā ṭhitāni.
anya-e0803n1:110_0: Padānaṁ niddeso panati antiādīnaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ vacanānamanurūpena yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n1:110_1: Evaṁ tikārakakriyāpadāni sarūpato vavatthānato niddesato ca veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n1:111_0: Idāni nopasaggākammikādivasena bhavatissa dhātussa vinicchayaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0803n1:113_0: Sopasaggā sakammā ca, iti bhūti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n1:117_0: Gahetvā catudhā hoti, iti ñeyyaṁ visesato.
anya-e0803n1:119_0: Bhūdhātu kārite sante, ekakammā bhavanti hi.
anya-e0803n1:132_0: Tatra yassa payogamhi, padassa kattunā kriyā;
anya-e0803n1:133_0: Nipphāditā vinā kammaṁ, na hoti taṁ sakammakaṁ.
anya-e0803n1:134_0: ‘‘Pacatī’’ti hi vutte tu, yena kenaci jantunā;
anya-e0803n1:135_0: Odanaṁ vā panaññaṁ vā, kiñci vatthunti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n1:136_0: Yassa pana payogamhi, kammena rahitā kriyā;
anya-e0803n1:152_0: Ettha bhavatidhātumhi, nayo eso na labbhati;
anya-e0803n1:154_0: Ediso ca nayo nāma, pāḷiyaṁ tu na dissati;
anya-e0803n1:157_0: Kārāpetī’’ti yo pāṭho, niddese taṁ suniddise.
anya-e0803n1:160_0: Etaṁ nayaṁ vidū ñatvā, yoje pāṭhānurūpato;
anya-e0803n1:163_0: Sagaṇe sagaṇe tesaṁ, vuttiṁ dīpetumeva ca.
anya-e0803n1:164_0: ‘‘Asmiṁ gaṇe ayaṁ dhātu, hotī’’ti tehi viññuno;
anya-e0803n1:166_0: Tathā hi bhāvakammesu, vihito paccayo tu yo;
anya-e0803n1:169_0: Nānāvidho nayo evaṁ, mayā ettha pakāsito.
anya-e0803n1:171_0: Te patvākhyātasadde avigatavimatī honti ñāṇīpi tasmā;
anya-e0803n1:173_0: Yogaṁ tesaṁ payoge paṭutaramatitaṁ patthayāno kareyya.
